main_logo.title: Main Logo
main_logo.description: Primary website logo displayed in header and navigation
guidelines: Use PNG or SVG format for transparency support
Ensure logo is readable on both light and dark backgrounds
Maintain 3:1 aspect ratio for optimal display

favicon.title: Favicon
favicon.description: Small icon displayed in browser tabs and bookmarks
guidelines: Use ICO format for maximum compatibility
Keep design simple and recognizable at small sizes

footer_logo.title: Footer Logo
footer_logo.description: Logo displayed in the website footer
guidelines: Can be different from main logo (e.g., monochrome version)
Should work well on footer background color
Keep similar proportions to main logo

social_share_image.title: Social Share Image
social_share_image.description: Default image shown when site is shared on social media
guidelines: Use 1200x630px for optimal social media display
Include key branding elements and text
Avoid small text that becomes unreadable when resized

login_background.title: Login Background
login_background.description: Background image for login and authentication pages
guidelines: Use high-quality images with good contrast
Ensure login forms remain readable over the image
Consider using subtle gradients or overlays

products.workflow_step_3_desc: Variants will be automatically generated (NÃM matrix). Configure pricing and inventory for each combination.
products.create_attributes_first: You need to create product attributes first before you can generate variants. Attributes define the properties that can vary between product versions (like Color, Size, Material, etc.).
products.existing_variants_no_attributes: This product has existing variants, but no attributes are available in the system. Create attributes to manage variant combinations properly.
products.legacy_variants_desc: These variants exist but cannot be managed with the new matrix system until attributes are created and assigned.
products.variants_read_only: Variants are automatically generated from your attribute selections above. You can only edit pricing, inventory, and SKU values.
products.matrix_generator_desc: Select attributes and their values to automatically generate all possible variant combinations (NÃM matrix).

products.matrix_example: Example: Color (Red, Blue) Ã Size (S, M, L) = 6 variants
